column1: seasonal temperatures are the average environmental temperatures across the activity period
activity period is moddeled after the latitudinal centroid of species' ranges. See text for details
mar = March; apr = April; sep = September; oct = October; all = year round
maximum body mass - calculated based on maximum SVL recorded for the species, and allometric equations as explained in the text
mean female mass - calculated based on mean female SVL, or other measures as explained in the "basis of female mas" column, and allometric equations as explained in the text
substrate: air - terrestrial, saxicolous and arboreal species; earth: fossorial and semi-fossorial species; water: semi-aquatic species
Red List status & population trend: according to the IUCN, data downloaded June 2012
